author: freemke
title: Awesome City Addition
review: Occasionally, Lego really bring out a set you just have to own.  This is one of those sets.  While not the most parts or the most challenging build, the detail on this set is amazing.  The minifigs are all well equipped and the sea creatures (turtle and crab) really enhance the beach feel.  While fairly simplistic in design, even the lifeguard station has some nice detail and good touches.  I also like the use of colours with Lego seemingly going brighter and bolder in 2022.
